com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

Class CreateContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.CreateContext

  • public class CreateContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The context while creating translator factories. Tracks some important state as we navigate the class graph.
    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAlternateEmbedPath(Path alternate)
      There are multiple paths that might lead to a place when dealing with embedded collections; this makes sure they all get into the embedCollectionPoints (if appropriate - they are only added if we are in an embedded collection.

      • enterEmbed

      • addAlternateEmbedPath

        public void addAlternateEmbedPath(Path alternate)
        There are multiple paths that might lead to a place when dealing with embedded collections; this makes sure they all get into the embedCollectionPoints (if appropriate - they are only added if we are in an embedded collection.
        Parameters:
        alternate - is another path to add as a potential embed collection point. no effect if we are not in an embed collection.

        public void exitEmbed()
